item.title: Readings shared November 13, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 13 November 2024 are

  • Readings shared November 12, 2024. #ITP #LeanProver #LLMs #Emacs
  • Categorical foundations of formalized condensed mathematics. ~ Dagur Asgeirsson, Riccardo Brasca, Nikolas Kuhn, Filippo Alberto Edoardo Nuccio Mortarino Majno di Capriglio, Adam Topaz. #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Formalization of physics index notation in Lean 4. ~ Joseph Tooby-Smith. #ITP #Lean4 #Math #Physics
  • How to discover short, shorter, and the shortest proofs of unsatisfiability: A branch-and-bound approach for resolution proof length minimization. ~ Konstantin Sidorov, Koos van der Linden, Gonçalo Homem de Almeida Correia, Mathijs de Weerdt, Emir Demirović. #ATP #SATSolvers
